cells.data:
export LOCAL_PATH=`pwd`
mkdir -p $LOCAL_PATH/instance/config/openshift/scripts
# Get the script
# Resulted in error "lookup index.docker.io on 192.168.65.9:53: cannot unmarshal DNS message" https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/1103 w/ docker v 1.12.6
# docker run -ti -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v ${LOCAL_PATH}:/data eclipse/che init
# cd ${LOCAL_PATH}/instance/config/openshift/scripts

# takes a while :|
git clone https://github.com/eclipse/che
cd che/deploy/openshift/
CHE_DEDICATED_KEYCLOAK=false
export CHE_MULTIUSER=true
export WAIT_FOR_CHE=true
